creator: akirasamejima@hotmail.com
text: apache can't get UTF-8 get string when i request with tag. (test2.html is a request document which data contains metatag set to utf-8) belown is error log [Thu Feb 24 17:44:48 2005] [error] [client 192.168.0.1] Attempt to serve directory: D:/slrclub/bbsdata/pds2/, referer: http://www.slrclub.com/test2.html test2.html calls image source reference from img01.slrclub.com we founding this problem on apache 2.0.53 win32 version (binary package) another base apache works well, such like as linux or bsd also, apache needs uri header conversation module (i'm korean, and this is most korean server needs) korea using EUC-KR and UTF-8 both. basically we used euc-kr, almost user turn off url transfering to UTF-8 setting on IE. cause of some server didn't parsing UTF-8 naming. so we using mod_url module. (it converting EUC->UTF8 UTF8->EUC) http://cvs.kldp.net/cgi-bin/cvsweb.cgi/mod_url/apache2/mod_url.c?cvsroot=modurl it matter on japan, korea, china some kinds of nation which using multi-byte language. now we try to changing apache to iis server. test.html & test2.html will working
